welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vitrolles, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and indulge in all the wonders our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, mainly used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Castellet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Castellet Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
